TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PagesSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class PagesSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 提供對於組態檔區段的程式設計存取。

span.span: Provides programmatic access to the section of the configuration file.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供方法來以程式設計方式存取和修改組態檔區段的內容。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the content of the configuration file section. 這個組態區段可支援在組態檔的範圍中設定特定 ASP.NET 網頁和控制項指示詞全域所有的網頁及控制項。This configuration section supports setting certain ASP.NET page and control directives globally for all pages and controls in the scope of the configuration file. 這包括`@ Page`指示詞，`@ Import`透過指示詞集合屬性，而`@ Register`透過指示詞集合屬性。This includes the `@ Page` directive, the `@ Import` directive through the collection property, and the `@ Register` directive through the collection property. 它也提供支援的標記型別對應至其他標記類型，在執行階段透過集合屬性。It also provides support for mapping tag types to other tag types at run time through the collection property. 指示詞中指定它們會處理 ASP.NET Web Form 網頁 (.aspx) 和使用者控制項 (.ascx) 檔案時的頁面和使用者控制項編譯器所使用的設定。Directives specify settings used by the page and user-control compilers when they process ASP.NET Web Forms page (.aspx) and user control (.ascx) files. ## Examples 這個範例示範如何指定以宣告方式的數個屬性的值`pages`區段，也可以做為成員的存取類別。This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the `pages` section, which can also be accessed as members of the class. 下列組態檔範例示範如何以宣告方式為 區段指定的值。The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the section. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/usingpagessection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/usingpagessection.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用預設值初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 取得執行個體類別使用方法。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan AsyncTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示在進行非同步的頁面處理時，等待非同步處理常式完成的秒數。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of seconds to wait for an asynchronous handler to complete during asynchronous page processing.

value.span: 值，表示在進行非同步頁面處理時，等待非同步處理常式完成的時間秒數。

span.span: A value indicating the amount of time in seconds to wait for an asynchronous handler to complete during asynchronous page processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為 45 秒。The default value is 45 seconds.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoEventWireup { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 ASP.NET 頁面的事件是否自動連接到事件處理函式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether events for ASP.NET pages are automatically connected to event-handling functions.

value.span: 如果 ASP.NET 頁面的事件自動連接到事件處理函式，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if events for ASP.NET pages are automatically connected to event-handling functions; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當是`true`，ASP.NET 並不需要您明確繫結事件處理常式頁面事件這類。When is `true`, ASP.NET does not require that you explicitly bind event handlers to a page event such as . 當是`false`，您必須明確地將繫結事件的方法。When is `false`, you must explicitly bind the event to a method. 例如，如果您有`Page_Load`方法程式碼中的頁面，將會在回應中呼叫方法只有當您撰寫程式碼類似的下列範例中的事件 (請注意`Handles`Visual Basic 和事件處理常式中的陳述式C# 程式碼）：For example, if you have a `Page_Load` method in the code for a page, the method will be called in response to the event only if you write code like that in the following example (notice the `Handles` statement in Visual Basic and the event handler code in C#): ```vb Partial Class AutoEventWireupExample Inherits System.Web.UI.Page Protected Sub Page_Load(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Me.Load Response.Write("Executing Page_Load") End Sub End Class ``` ```csharp public partial class AutoEventWireupExample : System.Web.UI.Page { protected void Page_Load(object sender, System.EventArgs e) { Response.Write("Executing Page_Load"); } override protected void OnInit(EventArgs e) { this.Load += new System.EventHandler(this.Page_Load); } } ``` 當是`true`，處理常式會自動繫結至事件在執行階段根據其名稱和簽章。When is `true`, handlers are automatically bound to events at run time based on their name and signature. 針對每個事件，ASP.NET 會搜尋名為根據的模式的方法`Page_` *eventname*，例如`Page_Load`或`Page_Init`。For each event, ASP.NET searches for a method that is named according to the pattern `Page_`*eventname*, such as `Page_Load` or `Page_Init`. ASP.NET 會先檢查一般事件處理常式簽章的多載 (也就是說，它會指定和參數)。ASP.NET checks first for an overload that has the typical event-handler signature (that is, it specifies and parameters). 如果找不到與此簽章的事件處理常式，ASP.NET 會檢查不有任何參數的多載。If an event handler with this signature is not found, ASP.NET checks for an overload that has no parameters. 當是`false`，您必須明確繫結事件處理常式事件，如上述範例所示。When is `false`, you must explicitly bind event handlers to events, as shown in the preceding example. 在此情況下，方法名稱不必符合模式。In that case, the method names do not have to follow a pattern. 預設值是`true`如果中未指定`@ Page`指示詞。The default value is `true` if is not specified in the `@ Page` directive. Visual Studio 建立程式碼後置檔案時，會自動包含屬性。Visual Studio automatically includes the attribute when it creates code-behind files. 適用於以 C# 撰寫的 ASP.NET 網頁，Visual Studio 會將值設`true`。For ASP.NET pages written in C#, Visual Studio sets the value to `true`. Visual basic，Visual Studio 會將值設`false`因為處理常式會使用繫結至事件的關鍵字，會自動插入 Visual Studio 所產生的事件處理常式時。For Visual Basic, Visual Studio sets the value to `false` because handlers are bound to events by using the keyword, which is inserted automatically by Visual Studio when it generates an event handler. 如果您設定至`true`，您可以省略 （或移除） 關鍵字。If you set to `true`, you can omit (or remove) the keyword. 請勿設定至`true`如果效能是重要考量。Do not set to `true` if performance is a key consideration. 啟用自動事件連接時，ASP.NET 必須先嘗試比對事件與方法 15 到 30 之間。When automatic event wireup is enabled, ASP.NET must make between 15 and 30 tries to match events with methods. 請注意下列有關繫結至事件的事件處理常式：Note the following about binding event handlers to events: - 如果您設定至`true`，請確定您的事件不也可以手動附加網頁事件處理常式。If you set to `true`, make sure that you do not also manually attach page event handlers to events. 如果您這樣做，處理常式可能會呼叫一次以上。If you do, handlers might be called more than one time. - 僅適用於網頁事件，不會針對事件頁面上的控制項執行自動繫結。Automatic binding is performed only for page events, not for events for controls on the page. - 為繫結事件處理常式的替代方案，您可以覆寫`On` *eventname*方法或控制項的頁面。As an alternative to binding events to handlers, you can override the `On`*eventname* methods of the page or of controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定或讀取程式碼中的屬性。The following code example shows how to set or read the property in code. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/usingpagessection.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/usingpagessection.vb#9)] 下列範例示範兩種形式會自動附加至網頁事件的方法簽章時是`true`。The following example shows the two forms of method signatures that are automatically attached to page events when is `true`. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/Default.aspx#50)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/Default2.aspx.cs#50)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/Default.aspx#50)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/Default2.aspx.vb#50)] 下列範例示範如何明確地連接事件時是`false`。The following example shows how to explicitly wire up events when is `false`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#51](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/Default.aspx.cs#51)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#51](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/Default.aspx.vb#51)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Buffer { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 .aspx 頁面和 .ascx 控制項是否使用回應緩衝。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether .aspx pages and .ascx controls use response buffering.

value.span: 如果 .aspx 頁面和 .ascx 控制項使用回應緩衝，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if .aspx pages and .ascx controls use response buffering; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回應緩衝處理開啟時，網頁或控制項的輸出緩衝處理整個頁面之後，才或處理控制項時。When response buffering is turned on, the page or control output is buffered until after the entire page or control is processed. 請勿設定至`true`如果效能是重要考量。Do not set to `true` if performance is a key consideration. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用屬性來設定整個網站的預設值。You use the property to set the default value for a whole Web site. 您可以覆寫這個值，個別的網頁或個別控制項。You can override this value for an individual Web page or for individual controls.

span.span: The ASP.NET version that any rendered HTML will be compatible with.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件對應到`@ Register`ASP.NET 網頁上的指示詞。The objects correspond to the `@ Register` directive on an ASP.NET page. `@ Register`指示詞可讓您指定的使用者控制項的標記前置詞。The `@ Register` directive allows you to specify the tag prefix for a user control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/usingpagessection.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/usingpagessection.vb#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void DeserializeSection(class System.Xml.XmlReader reader) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub DeserializeSection (reader As XmlReader)
public: property bool EnableEventValidation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定是否啟用事件驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether event validation is enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用事件驗證則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if event validation is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出是否應該執行事件驗證。The attribute indicates whether event validation should be performed. 預設值是 `true`。The default value is `true`. Web 應用程式可以選擇性地停用事件驗證，以還原到.NET Framework 1.0 版的行為。A Web application can optionally disable event validation to revert to .NET Framework version 1.0 behavior. 基底控制項會檢查此屬性來判斷它是否應該驗證事件。The base control checks this attribute to determine whether it should validate events. 衍生的控制項不會繼承這個基底控制項屬性，並因此不受限於預設事件驗證。A derived control does not inherit this base control attribute, and so it is exempt from event validation by default. 您仍然會指示在衍生的控制項上執行事件驗證，藉由新增 ASP.NET屬性衍生的控制項本身，並將它設定為`true`。You still instruct ASP.NET to perform event validation on the derived control by adding the attribute to the derived control itself and setting it to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 事件驗證減少未經授權的回傳要求和回呼的風險。Event validation reduces the risk of unauthorized postback requests and callbacks. 它會指示 ASP.NET 驗證只會在要求回傳或回呼期間控制項中引發這些事件。It instructs ASP.NET to validate only those events that can be raised in the control during a postback request or callback. 使用此模型時，控制項在呈現期間註冊其事件，然後回傳或回呼處理期間驗證事件。With this model, a control registers its events during rendering and then validates the events during the post-back or callback handling. 在 ASP.NET 中的所有事件導向控制項預設會都使用這項功能。All event-driven controls in ASP.NET use this feature by default.

span.span: One of the values for the property, which specifies whether the session state is enabled, disabled, or read-only.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示工作階段狀態為啟用。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that session state is enabled.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. span.span: if view state is enabled; if view state is disabled.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/usingpagessection.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/usingpagessection.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableViewStateMac { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定當頁面從用戶端回傳時，ASP.NET 是否該在頁面的檢視狀態執行訊息驗證碼 (MAC)。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether ASP.NET should run a message authentication code (MAC) on the page's view state when the page is posted back from the client.

value.span: 如果當頁面從用戶端回傳時，ASP.NET 該在頁面的檢視狀態執行訊息驗證碼 (MAC)，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if ASP.NET should run a message authentication code (MAC) on the page's view state when the page is posted back from the client; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檢視狀態 MAC 是網頁的檢視狀態保存至網頁傳送到瀏覽器時隱藏變數的加密的版本。A view-state MAC is an encrypted version of the hidden variable that a page's view state is persisted to when the page is sent to the browser. 當這個屬性設定為`true`，加密的檢視狀態會檢查以確認，它未被竄改用戶端上。When this property is set to `true`, the encrypted view state is checked to verify that it has not been tampered with on the client. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個屬性應永遠不會設定為`false`生產網站中，即使應用程式或網頁不使用檢視狀態。This attribute should never be set to `false` in a production Web site, even if the application or page does not use view state. 檢視狀態 MAC 有助於確保其他 ASP.NET 函式，除了檢視狀態的安全性。The view state MAC helps ensure the security of other ASP.NET functions in addition to the view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/usingpagessection.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/usingpagessection.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IgnoreDeviceFilters As IgnoreDeviceFilterElementCollection

summary.span: 取得 ASP.NET 在呈現網頁時應該要忽略的裝置標籤集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of device tags that ASP.NET should ignore when it renders a page.

value.span: ASP.NET 在呈現網頁時應該要忽略的裝置標籤集合。

span.span: The collection of device tags that ASP.NET should ignore.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 略過裝置標記已指定為應該傳遞至瀏覽器而非由 ASP.NET 處理時的 HTML 命名空間前置詞。Device tags to ignore are specified as HTML namespace prefixes that should be passed as they are to the browser instead of being processed by ASP.NET. 範例是`sys`Microsoft Ajax 項目所使用的前置詞。An example is the `sys` prefix that is used for Microsoft Ajax elements.

span.span: The default value is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MasterPageFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式主版頁面的參考。

value.span: 應用程式主版頁面的參考。

span.span: A reference to the master page for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值可以是相對或絕對路徑。The value of this property can be either a relative or an absolute path. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/usingpagessection.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/usingpagessection.vb#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxPageStateFieldLength { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定單一檢視狀態欄位可以包含的最多字元數。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters that a single view-state field can contain.

value.span: 單一檢視狀態欄位可以包含的最多字元數。

span.span: The maximum number of characters that a single view-state field can contain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 頁面和控制項的檢視狀態會儲存在隱藏的檢視狀態欄位中，呈現網頁或控制項時。Page and control view state is stored in hidden view-state fields when the page or control is rendered. 如果儲存之資料的長度超過值，資料分割成多個檢視狀態欄位。If the length of the data stored exceeds the value, then the data is split between multiple view-state fields. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/usingpagessection.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/usingpagessection.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Namespaces As NamespaceCollection

summary.span: 取得 物件的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects.

value.span: 物件的 。

span.span: A of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件對應到`@ Import`ASP.NET 網頁上的指示詞。The objects correspond to the `@ Import` directive on an ASP.NET page. `Import`指示詞可讓您指定自動匯入的應用程式的所有頁面的命名空間。The `Import` directive allows you to specify namespaces that are automatically imported into all the pages of an application. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/usingpagessection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/usingpagessection.vb#2)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies a code-behind class that .aspx pages inherit by default.

value.span: 指定 .aspx 頁面預設繼承的程式碼後置類別的字串。

[!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/usingpagessection.cs#18)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/usingpagessection.vb#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PageParserFilterType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定指定剖析器篩選器型別的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the parser filter type.

value.span: 指定剖析器篩選器型別的字串。

span.span: A string that specifies the parser filter type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 剖析器的篩選，也就是執行個體的類別，由頁面編譯處理程序，以便進行變更原始碼在執行階段剖析的步驟之前呼叫。A parser filter, which is an instance of the class, is called by the page compilation process before the parsing step to allow for changes to the source code at run time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/usingpagessection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/usingpagessection.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Properties As ConfigurationPropertyCollection
public: property bool RenderAllHiddenFieldsAtTopOfForm { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定系統產生的所有隱藏欄位是否都要呈現在表單頂端。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether all system-generated hidden fields are rendered at the top of the form.

value.span: 如果系統產生的隱藏欄位會呈現在表單頂端則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if system-generated hidden fields are rendered at the top of the form; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為

span.span: The default is

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來指定某些系統產生的隱藏的欄位是否呈現在表單的結尾。You can use the property to specify that some system-generated hidden fields are rendered at the end of the form. 在 ASP.NET 的版本早於.NET Framework 3.5 SP1，ASP.NET 會呈現部分的隱藏的欄位 (例如， `__VIEWSTATE`) 在表單頂端。In versions of ASP.NET earlier than the .NET Framework 3.5 SP1, ASP.NET renders some hidden fields (for example, `__VIEWSTATE`) at the top of the form. 其他的隱藏的欄位 (例如， `__EVENTVALIDATION`) 會轉譯的結束表單底部附近``標記。Other hidden fields (for example, `__EVENTVALIDATION`) are rendered near the bottom of the form, just before the closing `` tag. 依預設，ASP.NET 3.5 SP1，在所有系統產生的隱藏的欄位會都轉譯頁面的頂端。By default, in ASP.NET 3.5 SP1, all system-generated hidden fields are rendered at the top of the page. 這可確保這些欄位中的資訊會傳送到伺服器，即使在網頁完成載入之前執行回傳。This makes sure that the information in these fields is sent to the server even if a postback is performed before the page has finished loading. 如果設`false`之前在網頁完成載入, 執行回傳會造成 「 回傳或回呼引數無效 」 錯誤。If is set to `false`, performing a postback before the page has finished loading can cause an "Invalid postback or callback argument" error. > [!NOTE] > 雖然屬性名稱表示 「 所有的隱藏的欄位 」，由這個屬性的設定將不會影響使用者所建立的欄位。Although the property name indicates "all hidden fields," user-created hidden fields are not affected by settings for this property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void SetReadOnly() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 智慧的巡覽需要 Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 或更新版本。Smart navigation requires Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 or greater. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件具有 ASP.NET 網頁上沒有對應的指示詞。The object has no corresponding directive on an ASP.NET page. 物件可讓您在編譯時期重新對應到其他類型名稱的標記型別名稱。The objects allow you to remap tag type names to other type names at compile time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ValidateRequest { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，決定 ASP.NET 是否對來自瀏覽器的輸入檢查危險值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether ASP.NET examines input from the browser for dangerous values.

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

span.span: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

value.span: 如果 ASP.NET 檢查來自瀏覽器的危險值，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if ASP.NET examines input from the browser for dangerous values; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 藉由比較有潛在危險的值清單的所有輸入的資料執行要求驗證。Request validation is performed by comparing all input data to a list of potentially dangerous values. 如果相符，就會引發 ASP.NET 。If a match occurs, ASP.NET raises an . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/usingpagessection.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/usingpagessection.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::ViewStateEncryptionMode ViewStateEncryptionMode { System::Web::UI::ViewStateEncryptionMode get(); void set(System::Web::UI::ViewStateEncryptionMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 ASP.NET 用來在維護 值時使用的加密模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the encryption mode that ASP.NET uses when maintaining values.

value.span: 列舉值，表示 值加密的時刻。

span.span: A enumeration value indicating when the values are encrypted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能的列舉值是`Always`， `Auto`，和`Never`。The possible enumeration values are `Always`, `Auto`, and `Never`. 預設值是 `Auto`。The default value is `Auto`. 如果屬性設定為`Auto`，`ViewState`控制項要求時將會加密。If property is set to `Auto`, `ViewState` will be encrypted when a control requests it.
